Don't lis -- ten to Sa -- tan, with all His dis -- trac -- tion; Just turn to your spir -- it, and spring in -- to ac -- tion! Call -- ing, "O Lord Je -- sus!" You'll en -- joy Him all day long!

lyrics.stanza: Calling, "O Lord Jesus!" Oh, it makes our spirit strong! We can really touch Him, And our gloom is turned to song! Don't listen to Satan, with all His distraction; Just turn to your spirit, and spring into action! Calling, "O Lord Jesus!" You'll enjoy Him all day long!
